import React from 'react'; import { Dropdown } from 'carbon-components-react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Restart16, ArrowRight16 } from '@carbon/icons-react'; import moment from 'moment'; import './overview-page.scss' import PercentRing from "../../components/PercentRing" import OverviewTable from "../../components/OverviewTable" export default class OverviewPage extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { lastUpdated: moment().format('h:mm A') } } calculateRecognizedPercent(rec, not) { console.log("REC: " + rec + " NOT: " + not) return 100 * (rec / (rec + not)) } render() { const dividerStyle = {width: "100%", height: "1px", background: "#f4f4f4", marginTop: "24px"} return
